name: SEO Optimized Blog Post Generator
description: Auto-generate SEO optimized blog post based on a few key input

nodes.name: content_outline
nodes.title: Content outline
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

nodes.name: blog_post_generation
nodes.title: Blog post generation
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Using the provided outline: {{content_outline.content}} 
Create a complete blog post that follows these specifications:
1. Content Requirements:
- Follow the outline structure exactly
- Target word count: {{word_count}} 
- Optimize for keywords: {{primary_keyword}} and {{secondary_keyword}} 
- Match awareness stage: {{awareness_stage}} 
2. Writing Style:
- Professional but conversational tone
- Clear, simple language
- Short paragraphs (2-3 sentences)
- Use transitional phrases between sections
- Include relevant examples and specific details
3. Formatting:
- Use proper header hierarchy (H1, H2, H3)
- Include bullet points where appropriate
- Add suggested image placements
- Incorporate internal link suggestions
The final post should be engaging, informative, and optimized for both readers and search engines while staying within the word count limit.

ui_metadata.value: When shopping for a new sofa, start by picking a style that complements your design aesthetic. Decorating a formal parlor or seating area? Pick a sofa with a tight back and seat. Because these sofas lack individual cushions, they look tidier and feel more traditional. A tight-backed sofa with loose seats will also help you achieve a neat profile while offering more comfort. If you’re looking for a more laidback, lived-in look, search for sofas with loose back cushions and seat cushions. Although these iterations tend to be more comfortable, they run the risk of looking sloppy over time. A quick fix is to buy a sofa with a good warranty or high-quality cushions.  For a classic or European look, try tufted sofas. These timeless sofas mesh well with different furniture styles. Tufted sofas come in two versions: fully tufted (backs and seats) or partially tufted (just the back or seat cushions but not both). As stylish as these sofas might be, their stiffer appearance and feel may not be ideal for nappers or loun

word_count.title: Word count
word_count.description: The maximum length of your blog post is determined by word count. For instance, a mid-size post is 600 words.

blog_post_type.title: Blog post type
blog_post_type.description: The blog post type for this blog post

awareness_stage.title: Awareness stage
awareness_stage.description: The reader's awareness stage for this blog post

primary_keyword.title: Primary keyword
primary_keyword.description: This keyword will be integrated throughout your blog post, including the title and most headings.

secondary_keyword.title: Secondary keyword
secondary_keyword.description: This keyword will be integrated throughout your blog post and in most headings.
